titleStmt.title: A true account of the behaviour, confession and last dying speeches of the six criminals that were executed at Tyburn on Friday, the 12th of September, 1690
titleStmt.author: Smith, Samuel, 1620-1698.

notesStmt.note: Account signed: Dated this 12th of Septem. 1690. Samuel Smith, Ordinary.
Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
